title: Reemake Bug?
body: isn't it that people cannot remake if any of your member die under 3min of game ? I kill 2 of them at 2:43 and 2:48 and they can still remake ? since when you guys allowing this ? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
/remake can only be prevented if first blood happens **BEFORE** someone AFKs. Any kills that happen **AFTER** someone AFKs will have no impact on /remake. Read more about that [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/update-play-games-matter/remake).

That change was added to stop people from doing [this](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ycCG1GZg2bQ) XD
